payload.name: Config Category

payload.name: Category Item
payload.desc: The underlying item requested from the OCP

0_0.name: Request Advanced Options

payload.name: Config Category Options
payload.desc: When set to 0 the options will be requested from the server

values.0: Identifies this as a request for options settings.

payload.name: Advanced options
payload.desc: Signifies that we are requesting the advanced options from the server

values.0: The configuration item is advanced options.

values.0: Identifies this as a request for options settings.

values.1: The configuration item is extended options
